Name: Andurien
Details: The capital of the Duchy of Andurien, led by House Humphreys, Andurien has switched sizes a number of times between houses Liao and Marik, until the Free Worlds League regained control of the system and the region during the First Succession War. The world contains two major continents, Altay and Zahle, and contains several defense industries located mainly around on its planetary capital, Jojoken, which also houses the headquarters of the provincial military force, the Defenders of Andurien.
